trans-unit.resname: PLG20·1 | Reliquary Tower | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You have no maximum hand size.
trans-unit.target: 你的手牌数量没有上限。

trans-unit.resname: PLG20·1 | Reliquary Tower | Card Text | Paragraph 2
PLG20·2 | Hangarback Walker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: PLG20·2 | Hangarback Walker | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying for each +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，其上每有一个+1/+1指示物，便派出一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: PLG20·2 | Hangarback Walker | Card Text | Paragraph 3
